  • MNE

Warning

MNE is not yet available on the HIP.

MNE

MNE is an open-source Python package for exploring, visualizing, and analyzing human neurophysiological data: MEG, EEG, sEEG, ECoG, NIRS ([Gramfort_2013]).

Official ressources

  • MNE website

  • MNE tutorials

  • MNE documentation

  • MNE installation

References

Gramfort_2013

Alexandre Gramfort, Martin Luessi, Eric Larson, Denis A. Engemann, Daniel Strohmeier, Christian Brodbeck, Roman Goj, Mainak Jas, Teon Brooks, Lauri Parkkonen, and Matti S. Hämäläinen. MEG and EEG data analysis with MNE-Python. Frontiers in Neuroscience, 7(267):1–13, 2013. doi:10.3389/fnins.2013.00267.
